name: The Hells Grammar School Project
description: *Story* You tried completing Doom II, but you failed miserably, so the marine corps sent you to a mysterious place called: The Hells Grammar School. It is a place where doomers become legends. Complete this game and you are officially a true doomer. Attempt to go through a day of school at the Hells Grammar School. You will be going through 4 periods: English, Information Technology, Maths and Sport. Play at your own risk...
